lead_paragraph: An Austin police officer fatally shot a naked man who charged at officers and had been reported acting aggressively toward people in a neighborhood.

headline.print_headline: Texas: Naked Man Is Killed by Police
headline.main: Texas: Naked Man Is Killed by Police

snippet: An Austin police officer fatally shot a naked man who charged at officers and had been reported acting aggressively toward people in a neighborhood.
abstract: Police officer in Austin, Tex, fatally shoots naked black man who was reportedly acting aggressive towards people in neighborhood and refused to comply with police commands; officials do not reveal race of police officer or say whether man shot was armed.
